elements.name: pedigree
elements.title: Rate this team"s core ability to execute the most challenging aspects of this venture, based on the pedigree of the principals

elements.name: critical skills
elements.title: Has this team filled all the critical skills gap required to successfully execute this venture?

elements.name: experience&accomplishments
elements.title: How close does the team"s prior experience and accomplishments match the most difficult aspects of this venture?

elements.name: commitment
elements.title: Has the team demonstrated the commitment necessary to see this venture through to success?

elements.name: problem strength
elements.title:
Consider this venture’s offering from the vantage of its audience.  
How strong is the problem, need, or desire being addressed?

elements.name: size of need
elements.title: How many individuals, companies have this need?  How large is the addressable market in your estimate?

elements.name: market growth
elements.title: Is this a market that is growing fast or stagnating/regressing?

elements.name: competition
elements.title: How intense is the competition, either direct or indirect?

elements.name: coverage
elements.title: Has the offering/product been previewed by pundits, social media, reviewers.  How positive / negative is the reaction?

elements.name: market support
elements.title: How much support is this offering having in the market, either from channel partners, or organic marketing, or press?

elements.name: adoption
elements.title: How fast is the addressable market adopting this product/offering?

elements.name: competitor response
elements.title: What is the response from competitors (direct/indirect)?

elements.name: core capabilities
elements.title: Upon review of the solution, product, technology and core science, how transformative is this team’s offering to the market?

elements.name: review credibility
elements.title: Has the technology been reviewed by experts(you or other peers) to validate it?  How credible are the ac?

elements.name: technology risk
elements.title: How risky is this technology/approach?

elements.name: comparitive effectiveness
elements.title:
Comparing this offering with existing/upcoming alternatives.  
How much more effective is it?

elements.name: balance sheet
elements.title: Based on audited financials (if available), how strong is its balance sheet and ability to continually invest?

elements.name: revenue / profit momentum
elements.title: Based on audited financials (if available), how strong is the revenue and marginal profit momentum of the company?

elements.name: brand / community support
elements.title: How strong is the goodwill (brand or community support) of the company? How strong is the human capital goodwill of the company?

elements.name: intellectual property
elements.title: How strong is the intellectual property related to the company’s offering and roadmap?  Does it give it a competitive advantage?

elements.name: number of tokens issued
elements.title:
Review the schedule of token issuance by the company.
Do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be offered for sale?

elements.name: vesting schedule / time-locks
elements.title:
Review the schedule of vesting / time-locks on tokens in the ecosystem.
Do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be offered for sale?

elements.name: token demand
elements.title: Based on demand by trade/commercial buyers of tokens, do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be purchased?

elements.name: speculative demand
elements.title: Based on demand by speculative/financial buyers of tokens, do you anticipate greater than usual tokens to be purchased?

elements.name: bull brief
elements.title: Upon review, can you attest that the Bull valuation brief represents a best-effort, truthful, non-plagiarized, non-conflicted effort by the analyst?

elements.name: bear brief
elements.title: Upon review, can you attest that the Bear valuation brief represents a best-effort, truthful, non-plagiarized, non-conflicted effort by the analyst?

elements.name: jurist recommendation
elements.title: After reviewing the Bull and Bear valuation briefs what is your recommendation?
